dcterms:description: The Kent Vale dataset includes 483,915 thermal images collected from a rooftop observatory in a residential area, providing high-resolution data for district-scale analysis of urban elements such as buildings, roads, and vegetation.
dcterms:title: Kent Vale Dataset

dcterms:description: The S16 dataset consists of 882,006 thermal images collected from a rooftop observatory in an educational area, capturing thermal behavior of various urban elements and their impact on local temperature variations.
dcterms:title: S16 Dataset
